ygData.subject: Re: Bertoxx tinkering prices
ygData.msgSnippet: I disagree.  On the basis that the items do not provide enough functionality to merit a price.  You can buy regular bait, a regular fishing pole, and cast
ygData.messageBody:
I disagree. On the basis that the items do not provide enough functionality to
merit a price. You can buy regular bait, a regular fishing pole, and cast
spells and be better off than the items they left in the game for tinkering.
Yeah I made a compass and it rocks for my RL wife who can't follow directions
in game, but the majority of the GOOD items in the game that might sell were
left out.

The "only" possibility I can think of is Cams, since bows (although for anyone
but a ranger are almost cumbersome) are sellable in limited quantity.

-Kryogen Katspaw
Guild Leader, The Sworn
Gnome Wizard, Bertoxxulous

--- David Allardyce <inewton@...> wrote:
> Well I am willing to agree to a selling price on Bertoxx, but I am dubious
> that this price fixing will hold for very long.
>
> Maybe its my faction with the merchants but at 7pp i am just making a profit
> off of the poles themselves. I think we should shoot for something closer
> to 10pp for the poles... maybe 8 or 9pp. The spyglass should be expensive.
> 75pp seems like the right price, :)
>
> Here's to making a profit off of a trade skill for a change!
>
> Akel, gnome wizard
> Bertoxxulous
>
>
<HR>
<html>
>


=====
